mapper.select: select u.userid, u.No, u.sex, u.phone, u.name, u.password, u.roleid from user u where u.name=#{name}
select r.roleid, r.type, r.grade from role r where r.roleid=#{roleid}
mapper.delete: delete from user u where u.userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: update user u set u.No=#{No}, u.sex=#{sex}, u.phone=#{phone}, u.name=#{name}, u.password=#{password}, u.roleid=#{roleid} where u.userid=#{userid}
